en-US.title: UNM Truman Health Services
en-US.description: UNM Truman Health Services, located in Albuquerque, NM, offers a caring and professional environment for the transgender community. Providing healthcare services tailored to the unique needs of transgender patients, they are committed to patient-centered care. Their clinicians, who specialize in informed consent, offer a range of services, acknowledging and appreciating the diversity and worth of every person.

address: 801 Encino Pl NE, Albuquerque, NM 87102, USA
